biotools.summary: ComSin is a database of protein structures in bound (complex) and unbound (single) states. The developed server enables one to search for proteins in bound and unbound states with several options including sequence similarity between the corresponding proteins in bound and unbound states, and validation of interaction interfaces of protein complexes.
